snippet.title: Tinytopia - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Take on the role of the mayor, build flourishing toy towns and cities for your citizens and protect them from all sorts of cute catastrophes, in this toy city-builder game, Tinytopia. Watch the launch trailer for the game to learn more about the features which include 23 real-world and fantasy locales, physics-based challenges, and more. 

In Tinytopia, use toy building blocks to create awesome megastructures and transform charming villages into bustling metropolises.

Tinytopia is available now on Mac and PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG. The game also launches on the Microsoft Store for PC on September 27, 2021.

#GameTrailers #Gaming #Tinytopia
